title: Bereaved Deols bid farewell to Abhay’s father, Ajit Singh Deol
text: Bereaved Deols bid farewell to Abhay’s father, Ajit Singh Deol Saturday, 24 October 2015 (39 minutes ago) Array …read more Source:: Indian Express… A bereaved Deol family today bid adieu to one of their loved ones, Ajit Singh Deol. Ajit Singh, who was Dharmendra's younger brother, passed away on Friday,... Indian Express 6 hours ago - Entertainment You Might Like
